"Movement Controls":
"Movement Actions:
Jump: <%Jump>
Double-Jump: Press <%Jump> during a jump
Step (avoid attacks): <%Avoid>
Dash (Gamepad): Press and hold <%Avoid> while moving
Dash (Keyboard): Press a movement key twice and hold it"
